metadata.title: CVE-2017-12482 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The ledger::parse_date_mask_routine function in times.cc in Ledger 3.1.1allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack-based bufferoverflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impactvia a crafted file.

criterions.comment: ledger package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
